ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 32
ygData.msgSnippet: So this problem only happens if you are standing on the top level of the boat?  I always crash on the way to erudin as well, but I m also always on the top
ygData.messageBody:
So this problem only happens if you are standing on the top level of the
boat? I always crash on the way to erudin as well, but I'm also always on
the top level.

> ----------
> From: Joe-Sebastian Cadiz[SMTP:nip3chi@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, June 01, 1999 12:55 PM
> To: EQ_spell_research@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EQ_spell_research] Digest Number 32
>
> From: "Joe-Sebastian Cadiz" <nip3chi@...>
>
> I believe this is a boat bug, if you stand on the top level of the boat,
> you
> freeze up, loose all your hotkeys, and get to start up again
> on the boat, on the way back to qeynos, i was told it is two bugs kind
> of working together, one crash bug one bug nixes your hotkeys
>
